title: Looking for REA T207s - Bushelman and Bauman
author: wondo

posts.post_title: Looking for REA T207s - Bushelman and Bauman
posts.post_content:
If the winners of the T207 REA lots 566 and 567 are planning to break up them for sale or trade, I'd be interested in two cards - Bauman from lot 567 and Bushelman from lot 566.  Please reach out to me at jwondowski@aol or via PM.  Thanks!

I've got a potential on a Bauman - please let me know if you have a T207 Bushelman for sale or trade.

John Wondowski
